snippet: The World Health Organization must act to ensure it will not be caught flat-footed by future crises, Dr. Margaret Chan said at the start of a 10-day meeting.
abstract: World Health Organization official Dr Margaret Chan, at meeting of World Health Assembly in Geneva, proposes measures to overhaul organization's emergency response system to better address crises like Africa's Ebola epidemic.
lead_paragraph: The World Health Organization must act to ensure it will not be caught flat-footed by future crises, Dr. Margaret Chan said at the start of a 10-day meeting.

headline.main: W.H.O. Leader Outlines Changes in Response to Ebola Epidemic
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Switzerland: W.H.O. Leader Outlines Overhaul for Future Health Crises
